description.en:
Holder Finance builds an innovative plugin platform to enhance any DEX features on the Ethereum and BSC Networks with 4 exclusive services:
• HolderSwap OTC Desk – (please read the OTC explainer document on our website)
• HolderLimit protocol – Order Limits with charting, metadata structure & automated arbitrage trading.
• Dynamic trading fee adjustment – (Rewards HFi & HFS holders, Traders & Liquidity providers)
• Liquidity providing cap – (Incentivize HFi holders with reserved seats for LP)

The utility token HFS for HolderSwap token rewards all HFi and HFS holders through a minting process trading on HolderSwap platform and a farming program.
